title: multidice.io
author: multidice.io
created_time: July 11, 2022, 02:51:15 PMLast edit: July 14, 2022, 04:54:00 PM by multidice.io
content: Multidice is launching an Official Airdrop to reward its supporters. A total of 1200000 MDICE (3% of the total supply) with a value of 240000$ will be distributed. You can get free tokens every week while the crowdsale is open.General Rules:Each weekly report must be submitted after the week ends.Reports will be approved and tokens will be awarded after every ICO round ends.If the volume of approved tokens is higher than the available supply for the campaign, tokens will be distributed proportionally.TWITTER CAMPAIGN - 200 000 MDICE (0.5%)Follow usTweet/Retweet with our hashtagsSubmit your weekly reportFACEBOOK CAMPAIGN - 200 000 MDICE (0.5%)Follow usPublish posts and commentsClaim free tokens every weekREDDIT CAMPAIGN - 200 000 MDICE (0.5%)Follow usPublish posts and commentsClaim free tokens every weekYOUTUBE CAMPAIGN - 200 000 MDICE (0.5%)Follow usPublish original videosClaim free tokens every weekINSTAGRAM CAMPAIGN - 200 000 MDICE (0.5%)Follow usPublish posts and commentsClaim free tokens every weekBITCOIN TALK CAMPAIGN - 200 000 MDICE (0.5%)Add us to your signaturePublish original postsClaim free tokens every weekCheck all the details of the Airdrop hereMultidice.io ICO main thread.

comments.author: Tipstar
comments.body: Are you going to provide the signature code or do we have to make one ourself? And can we use our affiliate code in our signature?

comments.author: multidice.io
comments.body: Quote from: Tipstar on July 14, 2022, 02:36:23 AMAre you going to provide the signature code or do we have to make one ourself? And can we use our affiliate code in our signature?Hi, yes you can use the affiliate code in the signature. For now, you can create you own signature code, if we decide to provide a signature code, we let you know.

comments.author: multidice.io
comments.body: The 2nd week of the Multidice ICO Airdrop is ending soon!Don't forget to submit your weekly report to get free MDICE tokens. To submit the report, go to Multidice.io, sign up and follow the instructions.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: The signature bounty's highest pay rate is 20 tokens for Legend rank. Assume we value it based on the highest ICO price which is $0.2 which means $4/week. Can you give a more serious rate? Actually I don't plan to take this bounty regardless of the rewards, just think such of rate is too underrate to advertise something on the world's oldest bitcoin forum.

comments.author: multidice.io
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on July 14, 2022, 11:20:02 AMThe signature bounty's highest pay rate is 20 tokens for Legend rank. Assume we value it based on the highest ICO price which is $0.2 which means $4/week. Can you give a more serious rate? Actually I don't plan to take this bounty regardless of the rewards, just think such of rate is too underrate to advertise something on the world's oldest bitcoin forum.Hi, But if you take the 20 MDICE tokens per week and multiply by 4 weeks of pre sale, plus 12 weeks of public sale, gives you a total of 320 MDICE tokens ($64). And if you do the 6 campaigns, you can get a total of 1920 MDICE tokens ($384).Anyway, we will think about increasing the reward of legendary/hero members.
